name: IT201_Project2_Anthony_Pronti
description: I built a user interface to give the user abilities to change some aspects of a 3D object. The aspects the user can change are the shape of the 3D object and the amount of color in the object. There are toggles allowing the user to randomize size and color. Select object shape from the Dropdown Menu. Move RGB sliders to change colors. User can clear the screen and toggle on/off the destroy timer.
